title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Education Program Videos
body: Education Program Videos          Dragoon Soldier-Recruitment-Daily Life Officers Quarters Laundress Sutler Guardhouse Hospital Stables Quartermaster Storehouse Weapons Artillery-Intro-Types of Guns-Rounds-Cannon Crew  These videos all require Windows Media Player. If you do not have this program installed on your computer, click here. These videos were shot in analog. They are best viewed setting your player with a viewscreen of 200%.
